executive_summary: A 2-hour deep dive into solar system sizing for Iraq (Mosul, Erbil, Baghdad). Bilal researches components, pricing, and creates comprehensive sizing tables for different household sizes and quality levels. This is capacity-building work for solar training in Iraq - connecting technical knowledge (solar engineering), educational mission (training), and MENA focus. Represents a key 2025 project identified in patterns report.

temporal_patterns.date_significance: July 2025 - matches 'Solar Iraq Training' from patterns report

analyst_notes.significance: This conversation represents a KEY 2025 PROJECT identified in the patterns report - Solar Iraq Training. It connects multiple values: MENA focus, educational mission, technical expertise, and accessibility. This is NOT pure consulting (IAP) - the 2-hour deep dive and comprehensive approach suggest intrinsic engagement.
analyst_notes.pattern_recognition: This is likely a CAP or IAP→CAP transformation. The sustained engagement (2 hours, 46 messages), thorough research, and educational framing suggest this matters beyond professional obligation. Contrast with pure IAPs (WWTP, BMC ERP) which are more tactical.
analyst_notes.cap_vs_iap_assessment: Borderline CAP - has professional elements (deliverable, practical focus) but deep engagement, MENA connection, and educational mission suggest intrinsic meaning. This may be 'work that comes alive' - professional opportunity aligned with personal values.
analyst_notes.connection_to_patterns: Validates patterns report finding of 'Solar Iraq Training (July 2025)' as major 2025 work. Connects to: Educational mission value (0.80 confidence), MENA work trajectory, technical capacity-building, integration of multiple domains (solar + education + MENA).
analyst_notes.iraq_connection: This answers the patterns report question: 'What's your connection to Iraq?' Shows active work in 3 Iraqi cities (Mosul, Erbil, Baghdad) with practical capacity-building focus. Not superficial - deep local context (IQD pricing, local shops).
analyst_notes.temporal_context: July 2025 - Mid-year major project. 2-hour evening session suggests dedicated time for important work, not squeezed-in consulting.

analysis_metadata.methodology: SAREC Framework with attention policies and Come Alive (CAPs/IAPs)
